actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount which an individual may earn without suffering deductions from monthly insurance benefits on account of excess earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Revises title II of the Social Security Act by increasing to $3,000 the annual amount which an individual may earn without suffering deductions from monthly Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance benefits on account of excess earnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount which an individual may earn without suffering deductions from monthly insurance benefits on account of excess earnings.
